search.query: (index="s4gproj" source="seattleenergyusage.json") OR (index="s4gproj" sourcetype="weatherdata") OR (index="s4gproj" source="seattleforecastdata.json") | transaction host maxspan=500s | where tempi>-100 | sort _time | table _time, tempi, megawatthours

panel.title: Seattle Energy Consumption: Predicted v. Actual (saved model)

search.query: (index="s4gproj" source="seattleenergyusage.json" ) OR (index="s4gproj" sourcetype="weatherdata" tempi>0) | bin span=1h _time | eval _time=if(sourcetype="weatherdata", _time+60*60, _time) | stats first(*) by _time | rename first(*) as * | apply FinalEnergyPredictor as prediction | timechart span=1h avg(megawatthours) avg(prediction)

panel.title: Seattle Energy Consumption: Predicted v. Actual (new model)

search.query: (index="s4gproj" source="seattleenergyusage.json") OR (index="s4gproj" sourcetype="weatherdata" tempi>0) OR (index="s4gproj" source="seattleforecastdata.json") | bin span=1h _time | eval _time=if(sourcetype="weatherdata", _time+60*60, _time) | stats first(*) by _time | rename first(*) as * | where (isnotnull(megawatthours)) | fit DecisionTreeRegressor "megawatthours" from "date.hour" "date_month" "date_wday" "hum" "rain" "tempi" "tempm" "windchilli" "windchillm" "dewpti" | timechart span=1h avg(megawatthours) avg("predicted(megawatthours)")

panel.title: Proof of Concept: Prediction v. Actual for July 29 - August 3, 2017 (unknown consumption)

search.query: (index="s4gproj" source="new_watts" ) OR (index="s4gproj" source="seattleweatherdata7.txt" tempi>0) | bin span=1h _time | eval _time=if(sourcetype="weatherdata", _time+60*60, _time) | stats first(*) by _time | rename first(*) as * | apply FinalEnergyPredictor as prediction | timechart span=1h avg(megawatthours) avg(prediction)

source="SeattleForecastHourly.json" host="akwok-mbp15" index="s4gproj" sourcetype="weatherforecast" | eval _time=_time+7*60*60 | rename date_hour AS "date.hour", humidity AS "hum", "temp.english" AS "tempi", "temp.metric" AS "tempm", "windchill.english" AS "windchilli", "windchill.metric" AS "windchillm", "dewpoint.english" AS "dewpti" | eval rain=0 | apply FinalEnergyPredictor as prediction | timechart span=1hr avg(prediction)
